colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @323A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO 'JAM DPAL GZHON NUR GYUR BA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DANG, NYAN THOS CHEN PO GRANGS MED PA BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB BRJOD DU MED PA DANG, LHA DANG MI DANG LHA MA YIN DANG, NAM MKHA' LDING DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN YI RANGS TE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD KYI YUL LA 'JUG PA YE SHES SNANG BA'I RGYAN CES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO, ,RDZOGS SO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU REN DRA BO DHA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BAN DE YE SHE SDE LA SOGS PAS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA, ,ZHUS SO DAG GO , ,,
